item.title: Categories Post
item.description: I’m a post with multiple categories in the frontmatter: categories = ["programming","lorem","pseudo"] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

item.title: Linked post
item.description: I’m a linked post in the menu. You can add other posts by adding the following line to the frontmatter:

item.title: Go is for lovers
item.description: Hugo uses the excellent go html/template library for its template engine. It is an extremely lightweight engine that provides a very small amount of logic.

item.title: Hugo is for lovers
item.description: This is the summary Goto hugo releases and download the appropriate version for your os and architecture. Save it somewhere specific as we will be using it in the next step. More complete instructions are available at installing hugo

item.title: Creating a new theme
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, the bash command line, and that you are comfortable using Markdown to format content.

item.title: Administration Consulting
item.description: Our experts will help you manage your cloud environment and optimize your IT infrastructure to improve efficiency and reduce costs.

item.title: Azure Hybrid or Cloud Migration
item.description: Migrate your on-premises infrastructure to Azure Cloud with minimal disruption to your business operations.

item.title: Endpoint Management
item.description: Secure and manage all your endpoints, including desktops, laptops, and mobile devices, with our Endpoint Management services.

item.title: Logs & Analytics
item.description: Gain insights into your business operations and make data-driven decisions with our logs and analytics solutions.

item.title: Microsoft Office 365
item.description: Get access to the latest version of Microsoft Office apps and other productivity tools, all while staying secure and compliant with our Office 365 solutions.

item.title: Migrate from Jekyll
item.description: Move static content to static Jekyll has a rule that any directory not starting with _ will be copied as-is to the _site output.

item.title: Security and Compliance
item.description: Protect your business from cyber threats and ensure compliance with industry regulations with our security and compliance solutions.
